mapper.select: SELECT b.brdid, b.frid, b.title, b.regdate, a.nickname as writer FROM brd_freeboard b LEFT JOIN info_userinfo a on b.userno = a.userno ORDER BY b.brdid DESC

SELECT b.brdid, b.frid, b.title, b.regdate, b.content, a.nickname as writer, b.userno
FROM brd_freeboard b LEFT JOIN info_userinfo a on b.userno = a.userno WHERE b.brdid = #{brdid}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO brd_freeboard( frid, title, regdate, moddate, content, userno ) VALUES( #{frid}, #{title}, NOW(), NOW(), #{content}, #{userno} )
